content: @Pietro Albini is there any way to see the toolstate (https://rust-lang-nursery.github.io/rust-toolstate/) for the beta/stable branches?
the toolstate of Linux and Windows for these channels must always be test-pass. we'll fail the PR if the toolstate doesn't pass.
@kennytm that's not the case for miri though, is it?
well yeah. if you need to know the toolstate you could check the travis / appveyor log of the "tools" build. the end of the log contains a JSON of the state of each tool
